review: Works with any TV that has HDMI... my ass. It works with some televisions with Hdmi, not all. Google needs to make a list of supported devices instead of wasting people's time. It can not connect properly to my television, so I have to return it. Waste of my time, waste of my money. Be more forthcoming with information. Took me 4 hours to figure out why it wasn't working properly... because it was designed that way.
author: Haplo42

review: This is awesome. I can take anywhere and watch movies. Money well spent.

review: I don't use it all the time, but when I do it is great. I couldn't believe how cheap it was for what you are getting.

review: Great item!  Unlock your TV's potential with apps, streaming media etc.

review: These where both great. worked just fine. But i am still learning to use them. Price was right.

review: If the only thing you want is to have a tool for your Chrome browser, that this should be your choice. But if you want to have a second display for your device, then look further for Miracast compatible devices.
